entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
